var cssClasses = {
    ACTIVE: 'mdc-tab-indicator--active',
    FADE: 'mdc-tab-indicator--fade',
    NO_TRANSITION: 'mdc-tab-indicator--no-transition',
};
var strings = {
    CONTENT_SELECTOR: '.mdc-tab-indicator__content',
};
export { cssClasses, strings, };
